channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Street Lights not working, 11th October
item.description:
It has been quite a few months since the Street Lights were on and working in Milton Street.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 35 Milton Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Kipling Road pavement destroyed by heavygood vehicles, 11th October
item.description:
The pavement at the bottom of Kipling Road has been trashed by heavy vehicles they’re all ridges and bumps standing 10 cm proud of the surface I’m drop ways of 15 cm

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 4 Kipling Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broken ironworks on the Honeybourne line below the bridge, 10th October
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 63 Queen's Road, Cheltenham

We came to this park playing area it has smashed glass all round the outer fence and inside

item.title: Man hole cover in road., 10th October
item.description:
As cars drive over the man hole cover you can hear it bounce as the cars drive over. When you drive over you can feel the car drop.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 71 Wyman's Lane, Swindon Village

item.title: Blocked gully, 8th October
item.description:
Blocked road gullies on London Road. The gully outlet needs clearing as this keeps getting blocked. The water is cascading down London Road each time it rains.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 282a London Road, Charlton Kings
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Turned Sign High Street, Cheltenham, 6th October
item.description:
The Keep left sign in the middle of High Street, Cheltenham at the junction with Berkeley Street has been turned. It should face east.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 16 High Street, Cheltenham

item.title: Turned Signs, 6th October

Both signs are turned once again in Albion Street, Cheltenham, opposite Albion Place

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 31 Albion Street, Cheltenham

item.title: Street light removed, 6th October
item.description:
After a car damaged the street light opposite Rust Cottages GL523LU, it has been removed and the subsequent hole filled in. The three Bungalows have 5 pensioners in residence, three of whom are registered disabled.Being plunged into darkness is causing both a security and accident risk.Please could you let me know when this is being replaced. Thank you.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 179a New Barn Lane, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:
One of red lights facing Neptune Business Park is not working
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Kwik Fit Tewkesbury Road, Cheltenham

item.title: Pot holes not fixed, 5th October
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 63 Prestbury Road, Cheltenham

item.description:
A major dip / subsidence in road calls suspension to bottom out

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Bath Road, Cheltenham

item.title: Traffic lights not working on roadworks, 5th October
item.description:
For the past two mornings the traffic lights at the roadworks have been stuck on red both ways causing huge delays and long queues.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): The Maples Hayden Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pedestrian crossing flooded, again, 5th October
item.description:
Pedestrian crossing (traffic lights) on A40 Lansdown Road (adjacent to junction with Shelburne Road) flooded, yet again. Does this every time it rains, and has done now for more than a year. Causing a major inconvenience for pedestrians and cyclists trying to cross the road. Floods on both sides of the road at this location - cleaning out the gullies is NOT enough - the drains need to be checked / jetted through too.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 88 Lansdown Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
